summary: Drug misuse has been a persistent U.S. public health issue. The Substance Abuse and Mental Health Services Administration administers grant programs that aim to expand access to treatment for substance use disorder. To help evaluate 3 of the agency's largest grant programs, the agency looks at the number of individuals served. But that data is unreliable. title: Substance Use Disorder: Reliable Data Needed for Substance Abuse Prevention and Treatment Block Grant Program
